Different Crime.Crime Name: Fraudulent obtaining of passport or visa
identity_verification: Applicant's failure to establish identity satisfactorily using credible documents
legal_basis: Under IRPA, a refugee claimant must provide acceptable identity documentation or explain its absence reasonably
evidence_assessment: The applicant used fraudulent documents and failed to produce credible identity proofs despite having time and resources
procedural_fairness: Judicial review assessed RPD's decision-making process and application of IRPA rules
no breach of natural justice found
